answer: Future studies can utilize the current analysis of populous clusters in the Small Magellanic Cloud to further understand its structure by examining the line-of-sight depth and axial ratios (astro-ph/0104227).
explanation: This paper provides an analysis of age, metal abundance, and positional data on populous clusters in the Small Magellanic Cloud, which can be used to determine the line-of-sight depth and axial ratios of the SMC.
evidence_quote: The Line-of-Sight Depth of Populous Clusters
